about_the_game:
"RPG Maker XP Remastered OST" features 64 tracks originally released with RPG Maker XP: remade, remastered, rebuilt from the ground up to be even more spectacular than they've ever been.

Features:

  • 64 instrumental tracks rebuilt from RPG Maker XP
  • .mp4, .mp3, .ogg, .wav file formats are included.
  • The mp3 version of the album and 3 tracks of remixed versions are included as a bonus!

BGM list
  • Battle 1-4
  • Boss 1-4
  • Castle 1
  • Church 1
  • Dungeon 1-8
  • Field 1-5
  • Heaven 1
  • LastBoss 1-3
  • Negative 1-6
  • Positive 1-9
  • Ship 1
  • Slow 1-7
  • Theme 1-6
  • Town 1-8

Remix list

  • Battle 1
  • Bass 1
  • Field 1
